meanings.sent1: The waterjet from the fountain sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally stepped into the waterjet at the park and got soaked.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran through the waterjet, leaving a trail of droplets behind.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a refreshing waterjet on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The waterjet cut through the rock with incredible force.

meanings.definition: A tool that uses a high-pressure stream of water for cutting or cleaning purposes
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used a waterjet to clean the car engine.
meanings.sent2: The waterjet made quick work of cutting through the thick metal sheet.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef accidentally turned on the waterjet and sprayed water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The waterjet sliced through the debris like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the waterjet allowed for intricate designs to be cut with ease.
